author: Staff Reporter
text:
A police constable is among the two men arrested by the city police on charges of trying to rob a shopkeeper near the Mint bridge on Basin Bridge Road on Sunday.

Parameshwaran, the constable who was attached to Koyambedu police station, sources said, had tried to rob Abdul Rahim of Washermanpet of a bag of cash.

Parameshwaran was helped by a friend Jagan in the robbery attempt, police said.

They said that when Abdul Rahim called out for help, passers-by on the road managed to nab Jagan, while Parameshwaran managed to escape. Investigations revealed that Parameshwaran is wanted in an attempt to rob case at Ayanavaram police station.
title: Constable held for robbery attempt
